description: This file defines the main React component for a Kanban board application, including context providers, filtering logic, drag-and-drop column reordering, and UI rendering.

classes.name: KanbanBoardInner
classes.description: Main internal component managing filtering, column reordering, and rendering of the Kanban board.

classes.name: DraggableKanbanColumn
classes.description: Component enabling drag-and-drop reordering of columns with accessibility features.

methods.name: filterCardsAND
methods.description: Filters cards based on multiple criteria such as assignees, priorities, statuses, columns, and due date range.

methods.name: useFeedback
methods.description: Custom hook to access feedback context for showing toast messages.

methods.name: useExpandMode
methods.description: Custom hook to access and modify the expand/shorten mode for cards.
